title: How much bandwidth does a game of League of Legends take up approx?
body: My internet stopped working and I just played a game on a hotspot on my phone, but what I wanted to know was how much data does a game of League take up?

replies.body: Actually, it would not be that much. Basically everything is client side when you play a game online, so the only things that you receive send from the server would be data on position, spells used ect. Quick searching says about 25-30 mb per game
i would assume a crap ton. just watching 1 youtube video uses up quite a bit of data
